qas.question: Where is the basic MP3 decoding and technology patent free?
What happened to the patents that caused them to be patent-free?
When will the technology be patent - free in the United States?
Between which years did most of the MP3 patents in the US expire?

context: The basic MP3 decoding and encoding technology is patent-free in the <a0_0>European Union<a0_0/>, all patents having <a1_0>expired<a1_0/> there. In the United States, the technology will be substantially patent-free on <a2_0>31 December 2017<a2_0/> (see below). The majority of MP3 patents expired in the US between <a3_0>2007 and 2015<a3_0/>.
